channel.title: footswitch on NGENUITY™ 3D Visualization System User Guide
channel.description: Recent content in footswitch on NGENUITY™ 3D Visualization System User Guide

item.title: Footswitch (Optional)
item.description: The footswitch performs basic functions during operation through controls operated by a foot. 1 Left push button – Changes the camera orientation between standard and inverted. 2 Right push button – Starts or stops movie recordings. 3 Left pedal – Cycles to the previous imaging mode. 4 Right pedal – Cycles to the next imaging mode.
